job_description: You MUST be NSERC eligible in order to apply for this position.- Automate testing of all new and existing features- Build new tools to increase efficiency of product validation- Accountable for delivering quality and reliability of our BeanworksAP product.- Develop test automation infrastructure and scripts to ensure that existing products continue to function as they are supposed to, and help tract, resolve, and discover issues with products that are currently in production and those about to enter production.- Work closely with development and product teams from the beginning of story kick-offs, to understand features and create comprehensive test plans to verify functionality.- Execute Test Cases with multiple supported browsers on various operating systems.- Analyse test results and perform regression tests in an iterative development environment.- Identify bugs through systematic testing, help developers reproduce errors and verify defects are fixed.- Work with customer support, product marketing, and development in determining what to test and how best to seek resolution of the problems found.
